title: In Ferguson, Students And Teachers Face Tough Questions At School
teaser: Melissa Block speaks with Tom Lawson, the chair of the social studies department at the McCleur High School, which is in the Ferguson-Florrisant school district in Missouri. Some area high schools just had their first day of the school year, after delays following Michael Brown's fatal shooting.
